text: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania () is a 2014 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy movie written and directed by Shashank Khaitan, and produced by Hiroo Yash Johar and Karan Johar under the banner of Dharma Productions. The movie stars Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt, and Sidharth Shukla in the lead roles. This is the second time Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt have acted together after their debut in Student of the Year and was released on 11 July 2014 and was commercially successful at the box office. A sequel, Badrinath Ki Dulhania, also starring Dhawan and Bhatt, was released in 2017. It was not related to this movie. Karan Johar stated that the movie is based on the cult romantic classic Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge. == Cast == * Varun Dhawan as Rakesh "Humpty" Kumar Sharma * Alia Bhatt as Kavya Pratap Singh * Sidharth Shukla as Angad Bedi * Ashutosh Rana as Kamaljeet Pratap Singh, Kavya's father * Aditya Sharma as Kavya's brother, Ranjeet * Deepika Amin as Kavya's mother, Mrs. Pratap Singh * Mahnaz Damania as Kavya's sister, Swati * Gaurav Pandey as Shonty. * Sahil Vaid as Poplu. * Kenny Desai as Humpty's father, Mr. Kumar Sharma * Guncha Narula as Kavya's friend, Gurpreet * Shivani Mahajan as Humpty's teacher, Mrs. Chibber == References == Category:2014 romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Shashank Khaitan
title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
